text: Below is a table of all United States presidential elections in New Mexico since it became a state in 1912. New Mexico voted for the winning Presidential candidate from 1912 until 1976. This gave the state a bellwether reputation. Year Winner (nationally) Votes % Loser (nationally) Votes % Other votes Other % Electoral votes 1912 Woodrow Wilson (D) 20,437 41.39% William H.
